participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and optimistic, Emily enjoys connecting with others and seeks out new experiences.
participant_1.background: I wonder if my co worker likes me back. I am a college student who is a full time working mom. I was bullied for being overweight as a child. I started a small business so I could spend more time with my family. I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, Jake loves expressing himself through art and enjoys exploring new ideas.
participant_2.background: I like to dye my hair a variety of colors to fit my creative personality. My dog is my best friend, so I'd love to have lunch with him and learn some new tricks to teach him. I am an army ranger. I like to create art. My nickname is bubblegum.

content.text: I'm doing great! Thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to create art, dye my hair, and spend time with my dog.
That sounds really fun! I like to do a lot of the same things. I also like to go to concerts and hang out with my friends.
I've been to a few concerts recently! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
I know what you mean! I love discovering new bands. Have you ever been to a show at the Roseland Ballroom in New York City?
No, I haven't! But I've heard great things about it. It's supposed to be an amazing venue.
It really is! I saw one of my favorite bands there a few years ago and it was an unforgettable experience.
That sounds amazing! I'm definitely going to have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a really cool place to see a show.
